autonomy.question: Did I attribute my successes in social life, career, and finances solely to my own efforts and abilities, forgetting that God's providence is ultimately responsible for these blessings?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envious when seeing others' success, accomplishments, or possessions?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in a manner that used vulgar or inappropriate language
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a manner that used vulgar or inappropriate language, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with an intention that lacked self - control and used language that was vulgar or inappropriate
incontinence.question: Did I speak to others with an intention that lacked self-control and used language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with language that was crude or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with language that was crude or unbecoming, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
particularly during social gatherings , events , or when spending time
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly during social gatherings, events, or when spending time with friends?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly when spending time with friends at social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: on frivolous pursuits that compromise my financial obligations
prodigality.question: Have I excessively spent money on frivolous pursuits that compromise my financial obligations, family needs, and responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities, potentially harming my ability to provide for myself and others?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I placed excessive and wasteful pursuits over my financial obligations, potentially harming my ability to provide for myself and others?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs through words
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs through words, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through social media or conversations?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own amusement or to gain attention from friends
gossip.question: Have I indulged in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, for my own amusement or to gain attention from friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I allow unnecessary work on a Sunday, thereby disrespecting its sacred character?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

anger.question: Have I nursed anger towards those close to me, rather than seeking reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my heart, allowing it to consume me and causing harm to myself or others?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
